response.question: The Fairy One: Oh my, you are such a cute little bird, would mind making me company?

answers.text: a) AHm, I'm headed to the city...
b) Sure, why not.
c) Buzz off, I have more to do...I am A HERO!
d) (Sits next to fairy without saying a word)

response.question: Yeeeey let me help ya....I can feel so lonely on these parts....I really would like to share all the time I can with you....

answers.text: a)...Ok...that might be a bit too much....
b) Really, well with a cute fairy like you I sure do not mind...
c) AHrrrrr I am regreting this already!! That's it I'm walking!
d) (Nods and smiles to the fairy listening to what she has to say)

response.question: (Between the trees you see once again the really beautiful woman with her long gown, smiling you at you from afar, perplexed by her beauty you decide...)

answers.text: a) To keep on moving and pretend you didnt noticed she was there.
b) To get closer to see better how does she look
c) To move past her and ignore her as it is the shortest route to your journey
d) To wave at her and smile back.

response.question: (Seeing you continuing your path, she decides to greet youJ) Hi...what are just curious fella like yourself doing in such a deep forest...do you need some help? (She moves to grab your clothes with what seems to you some dense curiosity.)

answers.text: a) I am just passing by to get to the other side of the Forest, nothing special
b) Of course...please do, I am trying to reach the other side of the forest, but who is in a rush really?
c) Oh yah bloody creatures all into touching and mouth on mouth gritty business! Ya'll keep it to yourselves would yah!?
d) (You put your hand in your chest give a suprised look in your face and say: awwwww)(Response to it) she is suprised but she smiles back)

response.question: Naiad: As you reaching to what it seems to you the near end of your path,  you find a beautiful woman bathing her feet on the water, sitting making you feel a bit wowed by her majestic looks...You know she will notice you if you keep on moving to your goals so:

answers.text: a) Keeps on walking passing by her, and saying "HOwd'ya?" till you get to your goal.
b) (You get yourself nose distance close) hey baby doll...".
c) Hey M'am I'm just moving to get to the city I want no trouble. Have a nice day would ya?
d) "Hello hello, Pardon me my lady, ahm I am deeply sorry but I meant to go in that direction, I see no other way of reaching it but through this path, if you don't mind I will be on my way."

response.question: (She stares at your wounds, and she moves towards you quite rapid. What do you do)

answers.text: a) Wave my sword at her and say. Hey calm down, I mean no trouble, just moving to get to the city m'am.
b) Delighted you move your arm to caress her waist.
c) OH is party that you want...that's yo'll get... CHARGGEEEEE!!!!

d) (Wait for her to do her thing and show her a face of worry while you take 2 steps back to show your uncertainty/discomfort) (She reaches your arm and start on passing some water...to what you know can realize it was a cure....all your wounds are healed you feel all comfort imaginable...even more than prior to the quest...)
